name: Lazerhawk Overload
description:
Lazerhawk Overload

A small 2D Defense Shoot'em'up in 80s Cyberpunk Neon Bladerunner style.

This small game was made for an application at the Mediadesign university in Berlin.

The requirement was to finish a prototype of a game in the time frame of one month with Game Maker Studio.

Plot:

The year is 2004. It is the future.

Humanity has constructed a Network of Computers.

But the Network is not safe.

You are Major Stryker and your mission is to defend the last remaining power node of the Network against the Horde of bitCripplers.

bitCripplers is a hive A.I. which has evolved in the Network by itself and is trying to completely acquire control.

Now jump into the Cyberspace and save the world!

"It's time to take out the trash!"

The game's atmosphere was inspired by Far Cry 3 Blood Dragon.

This game won't steal you more than 5 minutes.
